/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the day. Trees, their leaves a vibrant green, provide a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a muted light over the scene.
